text.value: The business-key of the process execution
The user-task-id of the process execution

{project-identifier-placeholder} consolidate data-sets: {new-line-placeholder} This user-task releases the consolidation of data-sets at the DMS {dms-identifier-placeholder} or extends the extraction period. Currently there are data-sets missing from the following DIC: {dic-identifiers-placeholder}
If consolidation should not start, please set a new extraction period following the ISO 8601 time duration pattern.
